Hello again.

I'm Alex, a creative director, designer and front-end developer. My work spans brand identities, websites, apps, and experiences for nonprofit initiatives and global enterprises. I'm a hybrid of skills: at my best in fast moving, multidisciplinary teams. I prefer my content accessible, my code open source, and my wheels airborne.

What I love to do

  • Interface Design & Prototyping
  • Product Design & Branding
  • Interactive Storytelling & Data Visualization
  • UX & Information Architecture
  • Design intersecting the physical & digital

What I also do

  • Environmental Graphic Design & Wayfinding
  • Print Design
  • Front-End Development HTML, CSS, SASS, JS
  • Wordpress (PHP, SQL) & Squarespace Dev
  • Ecommerce Design & Dev (Shopify, BigCommerce, Liquid)

Currently

  • Freelancing. designinc.com/alexbloom

Previously

  • Morf Studio - Partner & Designer
  • The Experiment - Freelance Designer-Developer
  • Tyler School of Art - Adjunct Professor
  • Bluecadet - UX / Interaction Designer
  • Fort Franklin > Acquired by Connelly Partners - Art Director / Ad Man
  • The Heads of State - Print & Publication Designer
